Text.val: 03.04.2012 SH SCR17149 Removed '_D' from public name
31.10.2011 SH SCR16836 Changed output to UTF8 and added new fields to XML output
06.01.2011 SH SCR16062 Changed update <scf:paymentDate> to INVS_SFIP_PAYMENTDATE
18.11.2010 SH SCR15994 Changed logic to write payment level (now based on INVS
selection and no longer on BTPC level)
... set to 'Y' if move of file from temp to new directory is OK
@The following output form contains a DUMMY tag, because Magic is not able to
merge the <scf:Payables> group because this group does not contain a tag,
-- The following fields are mandatory, if blank then '.' is written to XML

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_RECP_SCFH_ID = :2 and INVS_ADMNO = :3 and INVS_CLNTNO = :4 for fetch only
